name: Guardian (itch) (Ecto Studios)
description:
Guardian

You stand as a small lonely ship which has one aim, to simply survive the onslaught of the enemy, formed of the cruelest, outragous beings the galaxy has to offer. Teleporting in the masses to your location. Is there an end to the maddness?

Guardian is a game in active develoment co-created by myself, Jared Williams and Andrei Patea, while the game art maybe open source and not by us everything else is. As begginers to the Unity Engine and as gamers ourselves we wanted to ask:

 "How hard can it be?" and we did. 

As you can tell this is what we've produced  XD. There's lots of ideas in the air and for certain can say that the game isn't finished. 

We hope you enjoy for now and smash your highscores!

-Ecto Studios.
